overview.archetype: Turn Meter Control / Debuffer / Single-Target Nuker
overview.booking_roi: Low (A1 utility does not require books)

gear_tradeoffs.pros: More A1 procs for TM control

overview.best_dungeon_use: Fire Knight, Doom Tower (Dark Fae, Scarab King)

a1.name: Psychic Whip
a1.notes: Attacks 3 times at random. Each critical hit decreases target's Turn Meter by 25%.

a2.name: Temptation
a2.notes: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit: 30% chance of placing 30% Decrease DEF for 1 turn. Places Sleep for 1 turn on targets under Decrease DEF.

a3.name: Hellish Blaze
a3.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. Extra 30% crit chance. Ignores 50% of target's DEF.

aura.effect: Increases Ally ACC in Faction Crypts by 50.

booking.impact: Low for A1 utility; A2/A3 benefit from books for damage/consistency.
booking.notes: Books not required for main TM control role.

damage_per_turn.a2: Decent AoE damage, DEF Down/Sleep utility

scenarios.bonus_damage: Multi-hit A1 procs Giant Slayer for boss damage
scenarios.notes: Maximize TM control and bonus damage on bosses.
Rarely used in PvP, but can be built for single-target nuke.

clan_boss.notes: CB is immune to TM reduction; not a CB specialist.

synergy.relentless_viability: Good for more A1 procs, but not mandatory.

investment.notes: Top-tier for Fire Knight, Doom Tower bosses, and Faction Wars.

draft_logic.notes: First pick for TM control dungeons.

gear_set_stability.Relentless: Good for more A1s, but can desync
gear_set_stability.Reflex: More A2/A3, but less overall stats

utility_comparison.comparison: Coldheart offers more nuke, Alure more consistent TM control.
Armiger is rare, Alure is epic and more reliable for bosses.

final_summary.mastery_preference: Giant Slayer for PvE, Helmsmasher for PvP
final_summary.booking_impact: Low for A1, moderate for A2/A3
final_summary.damage_rotation: A1 for TM control, A2 for AoE debuff, A3 for single-target nuke
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Works best with TM boosters and debuffers
final_summary.draft_value: First pick for FK/Doom Tower TM control

team_setups.name: Fire Knight TM Lock
team_setups.strategy: Speed boost, TM reduction, AoE nuke, cycle skills.

similar_champions.similarity_reason: Both are top TM controllers for bosses.
Both reduce TM, but Alure is more reliable for multi-hit.
